Latest News
-----------

[view all news](https://www.beachcitytx.us/newslist.php)

![](_assets_/images/news-2.jpg)

[### CITY COUNCIL MEETINGS ARE HELD THE 4TH, TUESDAY OF EACH MONTH](https://www.beachcitytx.us/news_detail_T5_R79.php)


[Beach City Council Meeting Schedule](https://www.beachcitytx.us/Council%20Meeting%20Schedule%202024-2025.pdf?t=202411010929260)

![](Beach City pics 2015 - Copy.jpg?t=202406261644140)

[### A PERMIT IS REQUIRED BEFORE ANY CONSTRUCTION MAY BEGIN, PER CITY ORDINANCE](https://www.beachcitytx.us/#)


**The City of Beach City requires that all Improvements/Construction must have an approved permit *prior* to beginning construction.**

**Please call the City office if you have** **any** **questions regarding this matter.**

Beach City Office Hours:
------------------------

**Monday:** 08:00 AM  - 12:00 PM  CST  
  
**Tuesday-Thursday:** 08:00 AM - 12:00 PM, 1:00 - 5:00 PM  
**Lunch:** **12:00-1:00 PM**  
 **Friday:** 08:00 AM  - 12:00 PM  CST  
  
**OFFICE NUMBER:**  
281.383.3180
